name: 4-hydroxybenzoate:NADPH oxidoreductase (brominating, decarboxylating)
definition: 4-Hydroxybenzoate + 2 NADPH + 2 Bromide + 2 Oxygen + 4 H+ <=> 2,4-Dibromophenol + 2 NADP+ + CO2 + 4 H2O
